queries.name: Owned objects

queryList.query: MATCH (m) WHERE m.owned=TRUE RETURN m

queries.name: Direct groups of owned users

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User {owned:true}), (g:Group), p=(u)-[:MemberOf]->(g) RETURN p

queries.name: Unrolled groups of owned users

queryList.query: MATCH (m:User) WHERE m.owned=TRUE WITH m MATCH p=(m)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(n:Group) RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest paths from owned objects to High Value Targets (5 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p=shortestPath((n {owned:true})-[:MemberOf|HasSession|AdminTo|AllExtendedRights|AddMember|ForceChangePassword|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|CanRDP|ExecuteDCOM|AllowedToDelegate|ReadLAPSPassword|Contains|GpLink|AddAllowedToAct|AllowedToAct|SQLAdmin|ReadGMSAPassword|HasSIDHistory|CanPSRemote*1..5]->(m {highvalue:true})) WHERE NOT n=m RETURN p

queries.name: Most exploitable paths from owned objects to High Value Targets (5 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p=allShortestPaths((n {owned:true})-[:MemberOf|AdminTo|AllExtendedRights|AddMember|ForceChangePassword|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|ExecuteDCOM|AllowedToDelegate|ReadLAPSPassword|Contains|GpLink|AddAllowedToAct|AllowedToAct|SQLAdmin|ReadGMSAPassword|HasSIDHistory*1..5]->(m {highvalue:true})) WHERE NOT n=m RETURN p

queries.name: Next steps (5 hops) from owned objects

queryList.query: MATCH p=shortestPath((c {owned: true})-[*1..5]->(s)) WHERE NOT c = s RETURN p

queries.name: Next steps (3 hops) from owned objects

queryList.query: MATCH p=shortestPath((c {owned: true})-[*1..3]->(s)) WHERE NOT c = s RETURN p

queries.name: Owned users with permissions against GPOs

queryList.query: MATCH p=(u:User {owned:true})-[r:AllExtendedRights|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|GpLink*1..]->(g:GPO) RETURN p

queries.name: Kerberoastable users with a path to DA

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User {hasspn:true}) MATCH (g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-512' MATCH p = shortestPath( (u)-[*1..]->(g) ) RETURN p

queries.name: Kerberoastable users with a path to High Value

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User {hasspn:true}),(n {highvalue:true}),p = shortestPath( (u)-[*1..]->(n) ) RETURN p

queries.name: Kerberoastable users and where they are AdminTo

queryList.query: OPTIONAL MATCH (u1:User) WHERE u1.hasspn=true OPTIONAL MATCH (u1)-[r:AdminTo]->(c:Computer) RETURN u

queries.name: Kerberoastable users who are members of high value groups

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE g.highvalue=true AND u.hasspn=true RETURN u

queries.name: Kerberoastable users with passwords last set > 5 years ago

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) WHERE n.hasspn=true AND WHERE u.pwdlastset < (datetime().epochseconds - (1825 * 86400)) and NOT u.pwdlastset IN [-1.0, 0.0] RETURN u

queries.name: Kerberoastable Users

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User)WHERE n.hasspn=true RETURN n

queries.name: AS-REProastable Users

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User {dontreqpreauth: true}) RETURN u

queries.name: Unconstrained Delegation systems
queries.category: Ready to let the dogs out?

queryList.query: MATCH (c {unconstraineddelegation:true}) return c

queries.name: Constrained Delegation systems
queries.category: Ready to let the dogs out?

queryList.query: MATCH p=(u)-[:AllowedToDelegate]->(c) RETURN p

queries.name: Unconstrained Delegation systems (without domain controllers)
queries.category: Ready to let the dogs out?

queryList.query: MATCH (c1:Computer)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-516' WITH COLLECT(c1.name) AS domainControllers MATCH (c2 {unconstraineddelegation:true}) WHERE NOT c2.name IN domainControllers RETURN c2

queries.name: (Warning: edits the DB) Mark unconstrained delegation systems as high value targets
queries.category: Ready to let the dogs out?

queryList.query: MATCH (c1:Computer)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-516' WITH COLLECT(c1.name) AS domainControllers MATCH (c2 {unconstraineddelegation:true}) WHERE NOT c2.name IN domainControllers SET c2.highvalue = true RETURN c2

queries.name: Shortest paths from owned principals to unconstrained delegation systems
queries.category: Ready to let the dogs out?

queryList.query: MATCH (n {owned:true}) MATCH p=shortestPath((n)-[:MemberOf|HasSession|AdminTo|AllExtendedRights|AddMember|ForceChangePassword|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|ExecuteDCOM|AllowedToDelegate|ReadLAPSPassword|Contains|GpLink|AddAllowedToAct|AllowedToAct|SQLAdmin|ReadGMSAPassword|HasSIDHistory|CanPSRemote*1..]->(m:Computer {unconstraineddelegation: true})) WHERE NOT n=m RETURN p

queries.name: Find computers with constrained delegation permissions and the corresponding targets where they allowed to delegate
queries.category: Ready to let the dogs out?

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) WHERE c.allowedtodelegate IS NOT NULL RETURN c

queries.name: Find computers admin to other computers

queryList.query: MATCH p = (c1:Computer)-[r1:AdminTo]->(c2:Computer) RETURN p UNION ALL MATCH p = (c3:Computer)-[r2:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group)-[r3:AdminTo]->(c4:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Logged in Admins

queryList.query: MATCH p=(a:Computer)-[r:HasSession]->(b:User) WITH a,b,r MATCH p=shortestPath((b)-[:AdminTo|MemberOf*1..]->(a)) RETURN p

queries.name: Users with local admin rights

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:User)-[r:AdminTo]->(n:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Domain admin sessions

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User)-[:MemberOf]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-512' MATCH p = (c:Computer)-[:HasSession]->(n) return p

queries.name: Users with adminCount, not sensitive for delegation, not members of Protected Users

queryList.query: MATCH (u)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-525" WITH COLLECT (u.name) as protectedUsers MATCH p=(u2:User)-[:MemberOf*1..3]->(g2:Group) WHERE u2.admincount=true AND u2.sensitive=false AND NOT u2.name IN protectedUsers RETURN p

queries.name: Groups that contain the word 'admin'

queryList.query: Match (n:Group) WHERE n.name CONTAINS 'ADMIN' RETURN n

queries.name: Groups of High Value Targets

queryList.query: MATCH p=(n:User)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(m:Group {highvalue:true}) RETURN p

queries.name: Non Admin Groups with High Value Privileges

queryList.query: MATCH p=(g:Group)-[r:Owns|:WriteDacl|:GenericAll|:WriteOwner|:ExecuteDCOM|:GenericWrite|:AllowedToDelegate|:ForceChangePassword]->(n:Computer) WHERE NOT g.name CONTAINS 'ADMIN' RETURN p

queries.name: Groups with Computer and User Objects

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(groupsWithComps:Group) WITH groupsWithComps MATCH (u:User)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(groupsWithComps) RETURN DISTINCT(groupsWithComps) as groupsWithCompsAndUsers

queries.name: Groups that can reset passwords (Warning: Heavy)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:Group)-[r:ForceChangePassword]->(n:User) RETURN p

queries.name: Groups that have local admin rights (Warning: Heavy)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:Group)-[r:AdminTo]->(n:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Users never logged on and account still active

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User) WHERE n.lastlogontimestamp=-1.0 AND n.enabled=TRUE RETURN n

queries.name: Users logged in the last 90 days

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) WHERE u.lastlogon < (datetime().epochseconds - (90 * 86400)) and NOT u.lastlogon IN [-1.0, 0.0] RETURN u

queries.name: Users with passwords last set in the last 90 days

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) WHERE u.pwdlastset < (datetime().epochseconds - (90 * 86400)) and NOT u.pwdlastset IN [-1.0, 0.0] RETURN u

queries.name: Find if unprivileged users have rights to add members into groups

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User {admincount:False}) MATCH p=allShortestPaths((n)-[r:AddMember*1..]->(m:Group)) RETURN p

queries.name: Find all users a part of the VPN group

queryList.query: Match p=(u:User)-[:MemberOf]->(g:Group) WHERE toUPPER (g.name) CONTAINS 'VPN' return p

queries.name: View all GPOs

queryList.query: Match (n:GPO) RETURN n

queries.name: Find if any domain user has interesting permissions against a GPO (Warning: Heavy)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(u:User)-[r:AllExtendedRights|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|GpLink*1..]->(g:GPO) RETURN p

queries.name: Can a user from domain ‘A ‘ do anything to any computer in domain ‘B’ (Warning: VERY Heavy)

queryList.title: Select source domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC

queryList.title: Select destination domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC

MATCH (n:User {domain: {result}}) MATCH (m:Computer {domain: {}}) MATCH p=allShortestPaths((n)-[r:MemberOf|HasSession|AdminTo|AllExtendedRights|AddMember|ForceChangePassword|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|CanRDP|ExecuteDCOM|AllowedToDelegate|ReadLAPSPassword|Contains|GpLink|AddAllowedToAct|AllowedToAct|SQLAdmin*1..]->(m)) RETURN p

queries.name: Find all computers running with Windows XP
queries.category: It’s not illegal. It’s frowned upon

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) WHERE toUpper(c.operatingsystem) CONTAINS 'XP' RETURN c

queries.name: Find all computers running with Windows 2000
queries.category: It’s not illegal. It’s frowned upon

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) WHERE toUpper(c.operatingsystem) CONTAINS '2000' RETURN c

queries.name: Find all computers running with Windows 2003
queries.category: It’s not illegal. It’s frowned upon

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) WHERE toUpper(c.operatingsystem) CONTAINS '2003' RETURN c

queries.name: Find all computers running with Windows 2008
queries.category: It’s not illegal. It’s frowned upon

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) WHERE toUpper(c.operatingsystem) CONTAINS '2008' RETURN c

queries.name: Find all computers running with Windows Vista
queries.category: It’s not illegal. It’s frowned upon

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) WHERE toUpper(c.operatingsystem) CONTAINS 'VISTA' RETURN c

queries.name: Find all computers running with Windows 7
queries.category: It’s not illegal. It’s frowned upon

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) WHERE toUpper(c.operatingsystem) CONTAINS '7' RETURN c

queries.name: Top Ten Users with Most Sessions

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User),(m:Computer), (n)<-[r:HasSession]-(m) WHERE NOT n.name STARTS WITH 'ANONYMOUS LOGON' AND NOT n.name='' WITH n, count(r) as rel_count order by rel_count desc LIMIT 10 MATCH p=(m)-[r:HasSession]->(n) RETURN p

queries.name: Top Ten Computers with Most Sessions

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User),(m:Computer), (n)<-[r:HasSession]-(m) WHERE NOT n.name STARTS WITH 'ANONYMOUS LOGON' AND NOT n.name='' WITH m, count(r) as rel_count order by rel_count desc LIMIT 10 MATCH p=(m)-[r:HasSession]->(n) RETURN p

queries.name: Top Ten Users with Most Local Admin Rights

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User),(m:Computer), (n)-[r:AdminTo]->(m) WHERE NOT n.name STARTS WITH 'ANONYMOUS LOGON' AND NOT n.name='' WITH n, count(r) as rel_count order by rel_count desc LIMIT 10 MATCH p=(m)<-[r:AdminTo]-(n) RETURN p

queries.name: Top Ten Computers with Most Admins and their admins

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User),(m:Computer), (n)-[r:AdminTo]->(m) WHERE NOT n.name STARTS WITH 'ANONYMOUS LOGON' AND NOT n.name='' WITH m, count(r) as rel_count order by rel_count desc LIMIT 10 MATCH p=(m)<-[r:AdminTo]-(n) RETURN p

queries.name: Top Ten Computers with Most Admins

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User),(m:Computer), (n)-[r:AdminTo]->(m) WHERE NOT n.name STARTS WITH 'ANONYMOUS LOGON' AND NOT n.name='' WITH m, count(r) as rel_count order by rel_count desc LIMIT 10 MATCH p=(m)<-[r:AdminTo]-(n) RETURN m

queries.name: (Warning: edits the DB) Mark Top Ten Computers with Most Admins as HVT

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User),(m:Computer), (n)-[r:AdminTo]->(m) WHERE NOT n.name STARTS WITH 'ANONYMOUS LOGON' AND NOT n.name='' WITH m, count(r) as rel_count order by rel_count desc LIMIT 10 MATCH p=(m)<-[r:AdminTo]-(n) SET m.highvalue = true RETURN m

queries.name: Top 20 nodes with most first degree object controls

queryList.query: MATCH p=(u)-[r1]->(n) WHERE r1.isacl = true WITH u, count(r1) AS count_ctrl ORDER BY count_ctrl DESC LIMIT 20 RETURN u

queries.name: Top ten nodes with most group delegated object controls

queryList.query: MATCH p=(u)-[r1:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group)-[r2]->(n) WHERE r2.isacl=true WITH u, count(r2) AS count_ctrl ORDER BY count_ctrl DESC LIMIT 20 RETURN u

queries.name: Find machines Domain Users can RDP into

queryList.query: match p=(g:Group)-[:CanRDP]->(c:Computer) where g.objectid ENDS WITH '-513' return p

queries.name: Find Servers Domain Users can RDP To

queryList.query: match p=(g:Group)-[:CanRDP]->(c:Computer) where g.name STARTS WITH 'DOMAIN USERS' AND c.operatingsystem CONTAINS 'Server' return p

queries.name: Find what groups can RDP

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:Group)-[r:CanRDP]->(n:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Return All Azure Users that are part of the ‘Global Administrator’ Role

queryList.query: MATCH p =(n)-[r:AZGlobalAdmin*1..]->(m) RETURN p

queries.name: Return All On-Prem users with edges to Azure

queryList.query: MATCH  p=(m:User)-[r:AZResetPassword|AZOwns|AZUserAccessAdministrator|AZContributor|AZAddMembers|AZGlobalAdmin|AZVMContributor|AZOwnsAZAvereContributor]->(n) WHERE m.objectid CONTAINS 'S-1-5-21' RETURN p

queries.name: Find all paths to an Azure VM

queryList.query: MATCH p = (n)-[r]->(g:AZVM) RETURN p

queries.name: Find all paths to an Azure KeyVault

queryList.query: MATCH p = (n)-[r]->(g:AZKeyVault) RETURN p

queries.name: Return All Azure Users and their Groups

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:AZUser)-[r:MemberOf]->(n) WHERE NOT m.objectid CONTAINS 'S-1-5' RETURN p

queries.name: Return All Azure AD Groups that are synchronized with On-Premise AD

queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid CONTAINS 'S-1-5' AND n.azsyncid IS NOT NULL RETURN n

queries.name: Find all Privileged Service Principals

queryList.query: MATCH p = (g:AZServicePrincipal)-[r]->(n) RETURN p

queries.name: Find all Owners of Azure Applications

queryList.query: MATCH p = (n)-[r:AZOwns]->(g:AZApp) RETURN p

queries.name: Find all Certificate Templates

queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' RETURN n

queries.name: Find enabled Certificate Templates

queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.Enabled = true RETURN n

queries.name: Find Certificate Authorities

queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Enrollment Service' RETURN n

queries.name: Show Enrollment Rights for Certificate Template

queryList.title: Select a Certificate Template...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' RETURN n.name
MATCH p=(g)-[:Enroll|AutoEnroll]->(n:GPO {name:$result}) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' return p

queries.name: Show Rights for Certificate Authority

queryList.title: Select a Certificate Authority...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Enrollment Service' RETURN n.name
MATCH p=(g)-[:ManageCa|ManageCertificates|Auditor|Operator|Read|Enroll]->(n:GPO {name:$result}) return p

queries.name: Find Misconfigured Certificate Templates (ESC1)

queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.`Enrollee Supplies Subject` = true and n.`Client Authentication` = true and n.`Enabled` = true  RETURN n

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Misconfigured Certificate Templates from Owned Principals (ESC1)

queryList.query: MATCH p=allShortestPaths((g {owned:true})-[*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE  g<>n and n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.`Enrollee Supplies Subject` = true and n.`Client Authentication` = true and n.`Enabled` = true return p

queries.name: Find Misconfigured Certificate Templates (ESC2)

queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.`Enabled` = true and (n.`Extended Key Usage` = [] or 'Any Purpose' IN n.`Extended Key Usage`)  RETURN n

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Misconfigured Certificate Templates from Owned Principals (ESC2)

queryList.query: MATCH p=allShortestPaths((g {owned:true})-[*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE  g<>n and n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.`Enabled` = true and (n.`Extended Key Usage` = [] or 'Any Purpose' IN n.`Extended Key Usage`) return p

queries.name: Find Enrollment Agent Templates (ESC3)

queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.`Enabled` = true and (n.`Extended Key Usage` = [] or 'Any Purpose' IN n.`Extended Key Usage` or 'Certificate Request Agent' IN n.`Extended Key Usage`)  RETURN n

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Enrollment Agent Templates from Owned Principals (ESC3)

queryList.query: MATCH p=allShortestPaths((g {owned:true})-[*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE  g<>n and n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.`Enabled` = true and (n.`Extended Key Usage` = [] or 'Any Purpose' IN n.`Extended Key Usage` or 'Certificate Request Agent' IN n.`Extended Key Usage`) return p

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Vulnerable Certificate Template Access Control (ESC4)

queryList.query: MATCH p=shortestPath((g)-[:GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE  g<>n and n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.`Enabled` = true RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Vulnerable Certificate Template Access Control from Owned Principals (ESC4)

queryList.query: MATCH p=allShortestPaths((g {owned:true})-[r*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE g<>n and n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.Enabled = true and NONE(x in relationships(p) WHERE type(x) = 'Enroll' or type(x) = 'AutoEnroll') return p

queries.name: Find Certificate Authorities with User Specified SAN (ESC6)

queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Enrollment Service' and n.`User Specified SAN` = 'Enabled' RETURN n

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Vulnerable Certificate Authority Access Control (ESC7)

queryList.query: MATCH p=shortestPath((g)-[r:GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|ManageCa|ManageCertificates*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE  g<>n and n.type = 'Enrollment Service' RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Vulnerable Certificate Authority Access Control from Owned Principals (ESC7)

queryList.query: MATCH p=allShortestPaths((g {owned:true})-[*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE  g<>n and n.type = 'Enrollment Service' and NONE(x in relationships(p) WHERE type(x) = 'Enroll' or type(x) = 'AutoEnroll') RETURN p

queries.name: Find Certificate Authorities with HTTP Web Enrollment (ESC8)

queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Enrollment Service' and n.`Web Enrollment` = 'Enabled' RETURN n
